nodes.text: Osi Hass was a Krikthasi male who lived during the Galactic Civil War. At the time, he was the leader of the Undrarian junieuw, presenting their support to the Alliance to Restore the Republic's bestrum algae harvesting plant, Aqualis Base. This allegiance, he hoped, would obtain for him high-tech weaponry so that he could destroy the Multopos.
